simulator.elevatormodules

Class DoorClosedSensor

  • java.lang.Object
    • simulator.payloads.Networkable
      • simulator.elevatormodules.Module
        • simulator.elevatormodules.DoorClosedSensor

  • public class DoorClosedSensor
extends Module
    Sends network messages to indicate whether each door is less than 1% open. If a door is less than 1% open, the corresponding message value is true, otherwise the message value is false. A separate message is sent for each door.
